At Toyota, we firmly believe that there is more than one answer to the issue of personal transport systems for the 21st century. We are working in a wide range of areas as shown in this chart. I should also note that our competitors all have similar plans, as ours is an intensely competitive business. 

Toyota believes that among these many technologies the hybrid vehicle has perhaps the greatest promise. Today, I will focus on the hybrid path. 

But first some background.
